name: Astraeology
description:
Through the art of Astraeology, important relics of the past can be rediscovered through guidance from the stars. Utilising ancient magic and simple focusing devices, players will search for the lost pieces of an untold story in this relaxing atmospheric puzzle game.

The game was created in 72 hours for the Global Game Jam in 2021, by a passionate small team of students. With tough times in the real world, we wanted to create a little slice of a more relaxing world you could get lost in. 

Big thanks to everyone who helped made this little game happen!

Creative Lead: Jonathan Marshall
3D Artist: Adam Wood
3D Artist: Oliwia Malek
VFX Artist & Programmer: Conor Preston
Music & Sound: Toby Ellis
